mapper.sql: SELECT EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO LIKE '%'||#{empNo}||'%' order by empno desc
mapper.select: SELECT EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO = #{empNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP (EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{eName}, #{job}, #{mgr}, #{hireDate}, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptNo})
